caption: Great new addition to Jay Street for pizza.  Solid cheese slices but they also have every topping you can want - pepperoni, chicken, white sauce, pasta, veggie, etc.

Because Their One Of A Kind Pizzas Are So Delicious And Today I Tried The Hawaiian Pizza. (With Pineapples + Ham Cubes) And The Cheesy Mozzarella Sticks with their Sauce. And I Loved The Hawaiian Pizza OMG!! :)
I am so over stores with bad customer service.  Pay attention and treat the people who visit your store like they keep you in business...because they do.

And the pizza wars of downtown Brooklyn have begun, as there are now 3 dollar pizza places within walking distance of eachother. Out of the 3 this one is definitely the best. Quick service and  the place is really clean. As for the slice quality its a hit or miss. Generally The ew good but sometimes the crust can come out a bit thin and undercooked and lacks cheese
